items.title: User Activity Sharing
items.description: Enable users to share their workout activities and achievements with friends within the app.
acceptance_criteria: User can post completed workouts to a social feed
Friends can view, like, and comment on shared activities
Privacy settings allow user to control who can see their posts
non_functional: Feed updates should load within 2 seconds
Privacy settings changes should take effect immediately

items.title: Friends and Followers System
items.description: Allow users to connect with others by adding friends or following their activities.
acceptance_criteria: User can search for other users by name or email
User can send and accept friend requests
User can follow others without mutual confirmation
non_functional: Search results should return within 1 second
Friend/follow actions should be reflected in real-time

notes: The requirement is high-level and does not specify detailed fitness tracking features; assumptions made about core social features. Fitness tracking core functionality is assumed to exist or be developed in parallel.
